item.title: How to Get Accurate Print Time Estimates with Klipper Estimator
item.description: Learn how to dramatically improve 3D print time predictions in Klipper using the Klipper Estimator plugin. Step-by-step setup for Moonraker, Mainsail, and KlipperScreen, plus a breakdown of what makes Klipper Estimator more accurate than slicers.

item.title: Flash Armbian on Your Bigtreetech CB1 eMMC Compute Module
item.description: A step-by-step guide to flashing Armbian Linux onto your Bigtreetech CB1 eMMC version

item.title: Use your TouchScreen with Klipper on Sidewinder X2
item.description:
Intro

If you have been following my recent posts, you know that I switched from Marlin to Klipper firmware on my Artillery Sidewinder X2. If you have done the same, you may be experiencing the same problem as me. I have already received questions from you about how much better the printing results are with Klipper, but that is another topic.

Our integrated display is useless!

But I found a solution - well - not perfect yet, but more than OK for my main use cases. After reading a lot of discussions I understood the relationships between the printer mainboard, the included TFT, Marlin and Klipper and got an idea.

item.title: Perfect input shaping - Install the ADXL345 accelerometer on Artillery Sidewinder/Genius Pro
item.description: About installing the ADXL345 accelerometer to calibrate easily input shaping for an Artillery Sidewinder with Klipper firmware.

item.title: Filament and Spool parameters
item.description: My list of relevant information about different filament I printed with.

item.title: Re-enable the Artillery Sidewinder X2 Filament-Runout Sensor
item.description: The post shows you how you can re-enable the stock Artillery Sidewinder X2 filament-runout sensor and configure with the Klipper3D printer firmware afterwards.

item.title: Must-have Mainsail, Klipper and Cura slicer configuration with Artillery Sidewinder X2
item.description: Tutorial about the must-have Mainsail, Klipper and Cura slicer configuration files with Artillery Sidewinder X2.

item.title: Klipper with Artillery Sidewinder X2
item.description: Shows a way to use Klipper as a replacement for the Marlin firmware with your Sidewinder X2

item.title: Flash latest Marlin firmware to Artillery Sidewinder X2
item.description: Step by step guide to flash the my compiled Marlin firmware to the Artillery Sidewinder X2 printer

item.title: Artillery Sidewinder X2 3D FDM Printer
item.description: Talking about the decision, pros and cons to buy an Artillery Sidewinder X2

item.title: Setup Rust and Bevy under WSL2 in Windows 11
item.description: Some easy steps to setup an initial Rust development environment in Windows 11 WSL2/Ubuntu Linux together with the needed libraries to compile and run all of the Bevy examples. All that is running within the brand new preview of the graphical WSL implementation.

item.title: Installing 'Oh My Fish' Shell
item.description: About installing fish, a very helpful modern bash alternative in WSL2/Ubuntu. Enjoy the benefits of the powerline and nice helpers and visualizations in your common workflows.

item.title: Windows package manager WinGet 1.0
item.description: A short intro to the finally released WinGet 1.0. It's a native Microsoft Package Manager to install, uninstall and update most of your daily used applications.

item.title: Why do I prefer Arch Linux?
item.description: About pros and cons using Arch Linux

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Personal data (usually referred to just as "data" below) will only be processed by us to the extent necessary and for the purpose of providing a functional and user-friendly website, including its contents, and the services offered there.

Per Art. 4 No. 1 of Regulation (EU) 2016/679, i.e. the General Data Protection Regulation (hereinafter referred to as the "GDPR"), "processing" refers to any operation or set of operations such as collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation, alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure by transmission, dissemination, or otherwise making available, alignment, or combination, restriction, erasure, or destruction performed on personal data, whether by automated means or not.
